title: Episode 29: Microprogressions
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
The Bronx's very own Bodega Boys giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Recorded (sometimes) at Red Bull Studios in NYC.

This week: Kevin Durant, Cop Shootings, July 4th, Wendy Williams, Meet The Wilsons, Bodega Boys spinoffs, Trump, Racism and more!

special shout to @DJDNA89 with the intro
